Package bio.singa.mathematics.geometry.edges

Class SimpleLineSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.geometry.edges.Line
      • bio.singa.mathematics.geometry.edges.SimpleLineSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineSegment
    public class SimpleLineSegment
extends Line
implements LineSegment
    A line segment is a part of a line that is bounded by two distinct points and "contains" every point on the line between and including its end points.

    • Field Summary

      • SimpleLineSegment

        public SimpleLineSegment​(double x1,
                         double y1,
                         double x2,
                         double y2)
        Creates a new LineSegment between the starting point p1 = (x1, y1) and ending point p2 = (x2, y2).
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-value of the first point.
        y1 - The y-value of the first point.
        x2 - The x-value of the second point.
        y2 - The y-value of the second point.

        end - The ending point.

      • getXValue

        public double getXValue​(double y)
        Gets the x-value in respect to a given y-value. If the line segment does not contain a point with this y-value this method returns Double.NaN.
        Overrides:
        getXValue in class Line
        Parameters:
        y - The y-value.
        Returns:
        The x-value.

      • getXIntercept

        public double getXIntercept()
        Gets the y-intercept of the line segment. If the line segment does not intercept the x-axis this method returns Double.NaN.
        Overrides:
        getXIntercept in class Line
        Returns:
        The y-intercept of the line segment.

      • getParallelSegment

        public SimpleLineSegment getParallelSegment​(double distance)
        Returns a new LineSegment parallel to this one, separated by the given (Euclidean-)distance. Negative distances return lines below, respectively left of this line and positive distances vice versa.
        Parameters:
        distance - The offset distance of the new parallel line.
        Returns:
        A new line parallel to this one.

      • getLineRepresentation

        public Line getLineRepresentation()
        Creates a new line using the attributes of this line segment.
        Returns:
        A new line using the attributes of this line segment.

      • getPerpendicularBisector

        public Line getPerpendicularBisector()
        Returns a new Line that passes through the middle of this segment with a perpendicular slope.
        Returns:
        A new perpendicular bisecting Line.
        See Also:
        Wikipedia: Bisection

      • getLength

        public double getLength()
        Returns the length of this segment (i.e. the euclidean distance between start and endpoint).
        Specified by:
        getLength in interface LineSegment
        Returns:
